a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Life expectancy vs. GDP per capita, 1543 to 2018
GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: UN WPP (2022); Zijdeman et al. (2015); Riley (2005); Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden, 2020)
Note: GDP per capita is expressed in international-$ at 2011 prices.
